de.griefed.serverpackcreator.swing

Class TabCreateServerPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.swing.TabCreateServerPack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TabCreateServerPack
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class creates the tab which displays the labels, textfields, buttons and functions in order to create a new server pack. Available are:
    JLabels and JTextFields for modpackDir, clientMods, copyDirs, javaPath, minecraftVersion, modLoader, modLoaderVersion
    Checkboxes for Include- serverInstallation, serverIcon, serverProperties, startScripts, ZIP-archive
    Buttons opening the file explorer and choosing: modpackDir, clientMods, copyDirs, javaPath, loadConfigFromFile
    A button for displaying an information windows which provides detailed explanation of the important parts of the GUI.
    The button start the generation of a new server pack.
    The label under the button to start the generation of a new server pack, which displays the latest log entry of the serverpackcreator.log during the creation of a new server pack.
    If a configuration file is found during startup of ServerPackCreator, it is automatically loaded into the GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabCreateServerPack

        public TabCreateServerPack(I18n injectedI18n,
                           ConfigurationHandler injectedConfigurationHandler,
                           ServerPackHandler injectedServerPackHandler,
                           VersionMeta injectedVersionMeta,
                           ApplicationProperties injectedApplicationProperties,
                           ServerPackCreatorWindow injectedServerPackCreatorFrame,
                           Utilities injectedUtilities,
                           DarkTheme injectedDarkTheme,
                           LightTheme injectedLightTheme,
                           ApplicationAddons injectedApplicationAddons,
                           ConfigUtilities injectedConfigUtilities)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor

        Used for Dependency Injection.

        Receives an instance of I18n or creates one if the received one is null. Required for use of localization.

        Receives an instance of ConfigurationHandler required to successfully and correctly create the server pack.

        Receives an instance of ServerPackHandler which is required to generate a server pack.

        Parameters:
        injectedI18n - Instance of I18n.
        injectedConfigurationHandler - Instance of ConfigurationHandler.
        injectedServerPackHandler - Instance of ServerPackHandler.
        injectedVersionMeta - Instance of VersionMeta.
        injectedApplicationProperties - Instance of Properties.
        injectedServerPackCreatorFrame - Our parent frame which contains all of ServerPackCreator.
        injectedUtilities - Instance of Utilities.
        injectedDarkTheme - Instance of DarkTheme.
        injectedLightTheme - Instance of LightTheme.
        injectedApplicationAddons - Instance of ApplicationAddons.
        injectedConfigUtilities - Instance of ConfigUtilities.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the VersionMeta could not be instantiated.
